attributes.additional_details:
I want Parliament to intervene and stop William Hague from arming Rebels, terrorists ,cannibals in Syria with Hi Tec Weaponry.

We have no right to be  providing weapons in this conflict.

Arming Terrorist Organizations is a clear breach off International Law.

Providing this weaponry  will  leave we the British Public, and our Service Personnel abroad and at home vulnerable and at risk from attack when these weapons  find there way in to the hands of organisations like Al Qaeda.

William Hague has no mandate from Parliament or the British Public, he is not acting in the best interests off the United Kingdom. His motives and actions are questionable in the current climate of fear that we all now live.

I ask you to sign this petition to force Parliament to intervene and investigate his actions. Parliament must ensure these weapons are never sent to Syria and the United Kingdom acts in accordance with International Law
